title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.329 - Installation of plastic pipelines by trenchless excavation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.329 - Installation of plastic pipelines by trenchless excavation

State Regulations

Plastic pipelines installed by trenchless excavation must
comply with the following: (a) Each
operator must take practicable steps to provide sufficient clearance for
installation and maintenance activities from other underground utilities and/or
structures at the time of installations. (b) For each pipeline section, plastic pipe
and components that are pulled through the ground must use a weak link, as
defined by section
255.3
of this Part, to ensure the
pipeline will not be damaged by any excessive forces during the pulling
process. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.329

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
